DOC.brief_summary: The study sponsor has developed a patented medical device called Seipher Wellness. This is a non-invasive medical device that assesses heart health based on established cardiac parameters; timing events of the cardiac cycle. These are specific parameters captured and analyzed by the device. A ratio of two specific timing parameters provides an assessment of the subject's overall heart health. The aim of this study is to validate the device algorithm across a range of subjects.
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older able to understand the informed consent document willing to participate ambulatory volunteers individuals with visible scar(s) or deformity in the test area of the chest nonambulatory subjects enrolled in another concurrent study or trial exercised excessively within the last 4 hours unwilling to sign informed consent female subjects who are pregnant, suspected or planning to become pregnant or breastfeeding
